title: Great!
text: Worthwhile hike up the mountain. Incredible views and very interesting. Tip: go with a tour guide, otherwise you will not know what you are looking at!

title: Avoid
text: Not often that I don’t finish dessert, but strawberry crepes were just awful. EUR 9 for crepes filled with strawberry Nesquik and chocolate sauce. Wife’s and kids dishes were all way too sweet, but that might just be how people in Greece like it. Way too expansive. Staff was friendly however.
